name: Simple Space (Demo)
description: This is a Space Invaders inspired shoot em up game. I've tried using my beginner coding experience to make a simple game that is fun and  has local multiplayer. I'm still working on other things like controller support and adjustable options, but as of now I have a playable game with 3 levels and I have it set so level 3 repeats infinitely  and enemy movement in level 3 is randomized.
